ś1. 
	CREATE TABLE item_transfer(
		account_id int(11),
		item_id int(11),
		ammount smallint(11),
		released binary
	);

2. Cart inventory
INSERT INTO item_transfer (`account_id`, `item_id`, `ammount`)
SELECT `char`.`account_id`, `cart_inventory`.`nameid`, `cart_inventory`.`amount`
FROM `cart_inventory`
JOIN `char` ON `cart_inventory`.`char_id` = `char`.`char_id`
WHERE `cart_inventory`.`nameid` IN (5137,5212,5133,5211,5253,5254,5260,5283,5359,5226,5207,5264,5189,5379,5200,5184,5186,5227,5228,5229,5292,5205,5282,5304,5303,5302,5210,5181,5185,5332,5209,5138,
5291,5187,5214,5129,5183,5285,5286,5134,5293,5288,5213,5272,5384,5456,5289,5284,5273,5274,5275,5276,5357,5294,5277,5315,5363,5801,5313,5318,5320,5354,5355,5364,
5372,5378,5387,5395,5403,5412,5421,5546,5397,5377,5574,5402,5396,5590,5306,5225,5258,5300,5305,5324,5325,5333,5334,5335,5336,5337,5338,5339,5340,5341,5342,5343,
5344,5345,5346,5352,5360,5368,5369,5380,5381,5389,5409,5436,5437,5438,5439,5440,5441,5442,5443,5444,5446,5447,5448,5449,5457,5479,5480,5481,5482,5502,5503,5509,
5529,5535,5536,5545,5546,5549,5550,5554,5556,5567,5569,5570,5572,5573,5579,5593,5803,5807);

3. Guild storage
INSERT INTO item_transfer (`account_id`, `item_id`, `ammount`)
Select `char`.`account_id`, `guild_storage`.`nameid`, `guild_storage`.`amount`
FROM `guild_storage`
JOIN `guild` ON `guild`.`guild_id` = `guild_storage`.`guild_id`
JOIN `char` ON `char`.`char_id` = `guild`.`char_id`
WHERE `guild_storage`.`nameid` IN (5137,5212,5133,5211,5253,5254,5260,5283,5359,5226,5207,5264,5189,5379,5200,5184,5186,5227,5228,5229,5292,5205,5282,5304,5303,5302,5210,5181,5185,5332,5209,5138,
5291,5187,5214,5129,5183,5285,5286,5134,5293,5288,5213,5272,5384,5456,5289,5284,5273,5274,5275,5276,5357,5294,5277,5315,5363,5801,5313,5318,5320,5354,5355,5364,
5372,5378,5387,5395,5403,5412,5421,5546,5397,5377,5574,5402,5396,5590,5306,5225,5258,5300,5305,5324,5325,5333,5334,5335,5336,5337,5338,5339,5340,5341,5342,5343,
5344,5345,5346,5352,5360,5368,5369,5380,5381,5389,5409,5436,5437,5438,5439,5440,5441,5442,5443,5444,5446,5447,5448,5449,5457,5479,5480,5481,5482,5502,5503,5509,
5529,5535,5536,5545,5546,5549,5550,5554,5556,5567,5569,5570,5572,5573,5579,5593,5803,5807);

4. Inventory
INSERT INTO item_transfer (`account_id`, `item_id`, `ammount`)
Select `char`.`account_id`, `inventory`.`nameid`, `inventory`.`amount`
FROM `inventory`
JOIN `char` ON `inventory`.`char_id` = `char`.`char_id`
WHERE `inventory`.`nameid` IN (5137,5212,5133,5211,5253,5254,5260,5283,5359,5226,5207,5264,5189,5379,5200,5184,5186,5227,5228,5229,5292,5205,5282,5304,5303,5302,5210,5181,5185,5332,5209,5138,
5291,5187,5214,5129,5183,5285,5286,5134,5293,5288,5213,5272,5384,5456,5289,5284,5273,5274,5275,5276,5357,5294,5277,5315,5363,5801,5313,5318,5320,5354,5355,5364,
5372,5378,5387,5395,5403,5412,5421,5546,5397,5377,5574,5402,5396,5590,5306,5225,5258,5300,5305,5324,5325,5333,5334,5335,5336,5337,5338,5339,5340,5341,5342,5343,
5344,5345,5346,5352,5360,5368,5369,5380,5381,5389,5409,5436,5437,5438,5439,5440,5441,5442,5443,5444,5446,5447,5448,5449,5457,5479,5480,5481,5482,5502,5503,5509,
5529,5535,5536,5545,5546,5549,5550,5554,5556,5567,5569,5570,5572,5573,5579,5593,5803,5807);ś

5. Storage
INSERT INTO item_transfer (`account_id`, `item_id`, `ammount`)
Select `account_id`, `nameid`, `amount` FROM `storage`
WHERE `nameid` IN (5137,5212,5133,5211,5253,5254,5260,5283,5359,5226,5207,5264,5189,5379,5200,5184,5186,5227,5228,5229,5292,5205,5282,5304,5303,5302,5210,5181,5185,5332,5209,5138,
5291,5187,5214,5129,5183,5285,5286,5134,5293,5288,5213,5272,5384,5456,5289,5284,5273,5274,5275,5276,5357,5294,5277,5315,5363,5801,5313,5318,5320,5354,5355,5364,
5372,5378,5387,5395,5403,5412,5421,5546,5397,5377,5574,5402,5396,5590,5306,5225,5258,5300,5305,5324,5325,5333,5334,5335,5336,5337,5338,5339,5340,5341,5342,5343,
5344,5345,5346,5352,5360,5368,5369,5380,5381,5389,5409,5436,5437,5438,5439,5440,5441,5442,5443,5444,5446,5447,5448,5449,5457,5479,5480,5481,5482,5502,5503,5509,
5529,5535,5536,5545,5546,5549,5550,5554,5556,5567,5569,5570,5572,5573,5579,5593,5803,5807);

6.
Update item_transfer Set `released` = 0;
